shelly.tips: - Outrange, slow, or overwhelm with spawnables

nita.tips: - Wall break opens up map to outrange Nita and quickly kill or pierce through Bruce (throwers)

bull.tips: - Don't let him get close or out damage him in close range (why are you even looking up this counter)

brock.tips: - Use agro or hit hard from a long range

el primo.tips: - Outrange or cancel/run away from him up close

barley.tips: - He's squishy so use assassins or break walls for throwers

poco.tips: - Tank his shots and melt him down or slow
poco.brawler_counters: Emz (also counters tank synergies), Jessie (denies enemy clustering and farms supers)

rosa.tips: - Scout Rosa out before she jumps on you or easily deal with her as she's approaching you. Countered by stuns/slows

jessie.tips: - Find a way to beat Jessie 1v1 typically by outranging or agro, and quickly get rid of turret (throwers, long range)
jessie.brawler_counters: Throwers, Belle, Squeak, anything that can destroy turret behind walls

dynamike.tips: - Dodge his main attack and get to him up close

tick.tips: - Pressure Tick up close or mid range

8 bit.tips: - Punish the player for being close to turret and being slow/tanky. Feed supers off him
8 bit.brawler_counters: Penny (turret + splash), Brock (wallbreak), Squeak, Piper, Belle

rico.tips: - Since he's reliant on walls but can't break them, use throwers or assassins
rico.brawler_counters: Throwers, wallbreak + range (Brock, Piper), Stu (wallbreak gadget)

darryl.tips: - Be prepared for when he rolls in and destroy him before he does or when he does

penny.tips: - Break walls or shoot around walls to deal with her turret
penny.brawler_counters: Same as Jessie, Kenji, Bo (range + wallbreak)

carl.tips: - Interrupt his super when he gets up close
carl.brawler_counters: CC, close range DPS (Buzz, Surge, Darryl, Jacky, Gene)

jacky.tips: - Outrange and mow her down or beat her 1v1

gus.tips: - Melt down his shield easily with high damage and usually getting up close. Low reload speed and can be outranged.
gus.brawler_counters: Piper (50/50; better in open maps), Mr. P, lots of HP (Darryl)

bo.tips: - Wiggle through his main attacks or stay out of range, then be aware of his mines or have some mobility to escape them or quickly trigger them

emz.tips: - Waste all her friend zoner gadgets and move in as an assassin/tank or outrange her by breaking down walls
emz.brawler_counters: Range (Janet), Mortis, throwers, Bibi, Darryl, Kenji

stu.tips: - Use spawnables to waste his ammo or have a wide attack that is hard to dodge

piper.tips: - Use aggro, spawners, or outrange her with a longer range sniper or thrower

pam.tips: - Punish her HP and healing abilities

frank.tips: - Punish his high HP and slow attacks. Any knockback destroys
frank.brawler_counters: Colette (push it), Primo (gadget + super), wallbreak/DPS (griff, chester)

bibi.tips: - Outrange her and destroy her cover

bea.tips: - She has low HP and can't break walls, be careful of her range, slow, and damage, she also struggles against spawnables that don't charge her loaded shot

nani.tips: - Find brawlers that can chip her to avoid giving Return to Sender value as well as easily dodge her main attack and super
nani.brawler_counters: Gene (high HP, negates R2S), Max, Darryl, Tick (tanks super with tick head/gadget)

edgar.tips: - Outrange him or deal with him up close with crowd control.

griff.tips: - Get out of his range which he spends a lot of time attacking in or beat him at midrange.

gale.tips: - Don't let him charge super by outranging him or peaking behind walls well and destroy walls so he can't utilize the stun with his super as much

bonnie.tips: - Punish her Clyde form for slow attack and movement speed, find a way to best mitigate her Bonnie form

hank.tips: - Use a brawler that can tank one shot from Hank and then melt him before he can deal another one, or outrange him before he can approach you and waste his big bubble

mortis.tips: - Don't let him get close to your or destroy him for trying to go through you

tara.tips: - Splash through her shadows or destroy her grass for ambushes

gene.tips: - Expect a pull and have an instantly spawnable gadget/super that can tank it or try to dodge it. Slow reload means overwhelmed by spawners or aggro.
gene.brawler_counters: Spawners (mr. P, Eve), gadgets to tank pull (Tara, Penny, Charlie), Belle (counters magic puffs with bounces)

max.tips: - Slow her down or be able to waste her ammo and tank/heal it off
max.brawler_counters: Crow (slow gadget), Gus (easier to hit shots), Stu, Pam (any tank/healer combo)

melodie.tips: - Outrange or use hard cc to stop her. Move into her super trajectory to minimize note dmg
melodie.brawler_counters: Clancy, Cordelius (removes notes in shadow realm), Buzz

mr p.tips: - He is quite weak without his porters and can't deal with aggro well

sprout.tips: - Assassins destroy Sprout, if not an assassin try breaking walls or dodging to get close
sprout.brawler_counters: Assassins/tanks like Mortis, Kenji, Darryl, Buzz

byron.tips: - Cripple his healing or destroy him due to low health. Weak to aggro.

squeak.tips: - Easily gets overwhelmed by aggro due to his slow damage output
squeak.brawler_counters: Assassins/Tanks like Kenji, Buzz, Leon, Mortis, Carl, Max, Edgar, Fang

gray.tips: - He plays like an assassin so just make it hard for him to teleport on you. Low reload spd/dps
gray.brawler_counters: Spawners, Gus (hard to kill with shield)

spike.tips: - Squishy brawler, deal a lot of damage to him quickly or find a way to attack through his life plant. Can't handle throwers.

crow.tips: - Have something to tank his main attack and jumps or outrange and quickly kill him
crow.brawler_counters: Snipers (heist), Spike, tanks (not in heist, they feed hyper)

leon.tips: - Use brawlers that can scout easily or are able to deal with his surprise attacks to prevent super chaining. Tanks are soft counters since they feed super, but can help defend teammates.

sandy.tips: - Outrange and cripple Sandy or be able to tank his low DPS
sandy.brawler_counters: Nita, Janet (wall peek + scouting super with gadget), Kenji

amber.tips: - Waste her ammo by dodging her attacks or burst her up close. Be wary of gadget if she's hugging a wall nearby.

meg.tips: - Slow and medium range while in mech. Once you knock her out of mech, barely a threat

chester.tips: - Can't deal much damage at a range so either move around and dodge shots or out damage/range him in a lane/wall peak situation

surge.tips: - Don't let him get that first upgrade, if he can't he isn't a threat, if he does don't let him keep upgrading by having gadgets or spawnables to tank his shots due to slow reload
surge.brawler_counters: Throwers, spawners (Tara, Ruffs, Nita), Spike, just don't feed

colette.tips: - Don't be a tank and you already have a decent advantage into the matchup, swarm her with spawners since her damage is low against them or consistently heal/have a shield
colette.brawler_counters: Snipers, throwers, Stu, Bea, Griff (business resilience), Jessie

lou.tips: - Escape from his super or outrange him to avoid getting frozen. Or contest area denial.
lou.brawler_counters: Bea, Belle, Bo, throwers, Poco (with protective tunes), Kenji (super removes freeze)

ruffs.tips: - Hit through his sandbags or be tanky enough to absorb his hits

belle.tips: - Outrange her with other snipers, or play agro/throwers

buzz.tips: - Have a way to move away or to stun Buzz before he stuns you

ash.tips: - Splash through his rats, and find a way to stun him or prevent him from getting a lot of rage and hitting hard. Brawlers that can get on top of him and win 1v1 are good vs Ash.

lola.tips: - Punish Lola for using her ego by hitting both of them or outsnipe her

fang.tips: - Spawnables and some form of counter play when he jumps onto you is necessary, with the stun you have to be faster than him as well

eve.tips: - Splash her hatchlings and avoid the big egg shot to have her retreat for control
eve.brawler_counters: Snipers (no more than one), splash/AOE (Penny, Janet), Max (dodging + aggro)

janet.tips: - Outrange her or be able to deal with her chip damage before she can fly away. Lacks DPS to beat aggro

otis.tips: - Outrange him and don't rely on up close burst damage or use a spawnable to tank the shot

sam.tips: - Don't let him get back his knucklebusters and be aware of them when he's coming for you so you can dodge or not get pulled

buster.tips: - Don't let him get the surprise on you with his gadget or super, flank him to get past his super or be patient for it to run out. Tanks outdps him close range.

mandy.tips: - Know where she is and always be aware of attacks you can't see, she is weak to agro or anything forcing her to move
mandy.brawler_counters: Nani (range + gadget the super), long range throwers, assassins

r t.tips: - Dodge his shots well since his attack is thin and be able to escape from him when he changes forms
r t.brawler_counters: throwers (not a hard counter), Gus, Bo, Max

maisie.tips: - Don't let her predict where you're going or slightly outrange her and be aware of her Disengage gadget and super.

cordelius.tips: - Be aware of either him jumping on you with gadget or after shadow realm is over and using mute. You can waste shadow realm by being fidgety while he's aiming it or running away when you get hit.

charlie.tips: - Outburst her or outsustain her. Take advantage of slow projectile speed at max range on squishy brawlers. She has low dmg in 1v1 so if you have a way to handle spiders (pierce), you will win.

larry.tips: - Thrower counters and some way to deal with lawrie will help a lot.

larry and lawrie.tips: - Thrower counters and some way to deal with lawrie will help a lot.

lawrie.tips: - Thrower counters and some way to deal with lawrie will help a lot.

willow.tips: - Usual thrower counters will do well vs willow. Willow also does poorly into tanks, esp if they can heal due to DoT.

mico.tips: - Countered by any high hp brawler or fast brawler.

pearl.tips: - Aggressive playstyle to force her to shoot constantly will keep her dmg low.

chuck.tips: - Weak 1v1. Assassinate him after he super to prevent him from superchaining.
chuck.brawler_counters: Defense (Cordelius, Clancy), farm + base race with DPS (Colt, Bull, Brock, Melodie)

doug.tips: - Don't let him get near you to charge his super. If you prevent him from super cycling and pumping dmg, not a major threat.

kit.tips: - Kit wants to jump on squishy brawlers. Any tank deletes Kit
kit.brawler_counters: Charlie/Cord (removes Kit from super), RT, Chester

lily.tips: - He can pop out of anywhere with vanish gadget. Tanks/shotgunners outdps him. Do not play 6k hp brawlers (colt, rico, etc.) or you will get one shot.
lily.brawler_counters: Jacky, Bull, Shelly, bait the gadget

angelo.tips: - High upfront burst dmg, low overall dps and reload. Dodge his charged shot and he's not a major threat. Be careful hiding behind a wall if you're low due to his gadget.
angelo.brawler_counters: Kit (3shot + water stun lock bug) (shoutout juan carlos), Max (aggro), Nani (range + gadget)

draco.tips: - Keep in mind his sweetspot and ban out healing comps that synergize with him (Kit, Byron)

berry.tips: - Tanks and mobility overwhelm him. Same weaknesses as classic throwers

clancy.tips: - Weak vs long range brawlers or throwers on some maps who can stay out of range. Try not to feed him his upgrades.

moe.tips: - Weak in small form if you are close. Be careful of diagonals for stacked shots.

kenji.tips: - Similar counters to mortis. When he supers, look for small white smoke to see where he will be afters super.

juju.tips: - Too new but classic thrower counters are good and watch out for water maps preventing assassins from hitting her
juju.brawler_counters: Frank, breaking walls/grass, long range throwers (Tick, Sprout)

shade.tips: - Weak to tanks and wallbreaks (that aren't too squishy).
shade.brawler_counters: Tanks, Frank, Lou (counters super), Jacky, Hank

meeple.tips: - Meeple is low dps and slow reload. Also midrange so loses to snipers on long range maps.

ollie.tips: - Extremely low dps. Just don't chase him when he supers to avoid getting hypnotized.

lumi.tips: - Bad vs brawlers that outrange + throwers.
lumi.brawler_counters: Weak to aggro. Snipers beat her on long range maps.

kaze.tips: - Walls can mess up geisha form like mortis. Bad against tanks.

alli.tips: - Should be weak to tanks due to dps difference and slow reload.

trunk.brawler_counters: Tank counters and higher dps/hp tanks beat.
